overview: Amia arrived early for the interview, but when he sat too close, she knew she had two jobs that night!  Ashly was late for the job, so she made it up to him in her own way!  Dani was shocked when he wanted to watch her undress, but soon she liked the idea, and what happened next!  Michelle thought it was strange that they wanted her to work in her underwear, but hey - it's a job!
title: Boffing the Babysitter 3
